video.title: Magic City
video.synopsis: Ike Evans is a king in Miami thanks to his hotel, which hosts celebrities of all types. But things change when Castro's rebels take over Cuba in 1959.

episodes.synopsis: To ensure the success of his showy establishment, Miami hotelier Ike Evans strikes a deal with a sharky mobster that forever seals his fate.
episodes.title: The Year of the Fin

episodes.synopsis: While Stevie's affair with Ben Diamond's wife escalates, Ike's law-student son, Danny, helps the district attorney go after organized crime.
episodes.title: Feeding Frenzy

episodes.synopsis: Ben begins to suspect that Lily hasn't been faithful. Meanwhile, Ike tries to get gambling legalized by bribing government officials.
episodes.title: Castles Made of Sand

episodes.synopsis: Ike deals with a hotel break-in. Meanwhile, Vera plays politics to ensure that Jackie Kennedy attends an upcoming charity event.
episodes.title: Atonement

episodes.synopsis: While Ike uses his influence to keep blonde bombshell Judi Silver safe, Vera tries a new tactic to get herself pregnant.
episodes.title: Suicide Blonde

episodes.synopsis: After confirming she'll attend Vera's charity event, Jackie Kennedy cancels. Meanwhile, Danny intercepts Stevie's blackmail photos.
episodes.title: The Harder They Fall

episodes.synopsis: Ike is forced to make a deal to stay afloat when Ben catches him in a lie. Danny chooses to confront Stevie about his affair with Lily.
episodes.title: Who's the Horse and Who's the Rider?

episodes.synopsis: While Victor and Mercedes process bad news, Stevie and Lily's affair drifts into ever-dangerous territory, and Ike's future hangs in the balance.
episodes.title: Time and Tide

episodes.synopsis: Jailed for murder and seeking bail, Ike reveals his mob connections to his wife and son. Ben, fearing Ike will cave under pressure, offers his help.
episodes.title: Crime and Punishment

episodes.synopsis: After Ike undertakes a risky scheme to cut Ben out, Ben seeks permission to kill him. Meg threatens Vera, and Ben hosts a decadent gathering.
episodes.title: Angels of Death

episodes.synopsis: Ike heads to Cuba to finalize plans to oust Ben from the Miramar, while Stevie, falling deeper into Ben's orbit, offers drugs to an exhausted Vera.
episodes.title: Adapt or Die

episodes.synopsis: Ike offers his dicey hotel swap to Ben's mob mentor, Sy, while Ben ruins a deadly arms deal with the Cubans, igniting tragedy.
episodes.title: Crossroads

episodes.synopsis: To impress Ike, Meg uses her contacts to help defeat Klein's gambling bill. Ben makes Stevie an offer, and Vera rethinks her future as a dancer.
episodes.title: World in Changes

episodes.synopsis: The Miramar is overrun by Stevie's debauched deejay convention, and Ike uncorks his Cuban lottery fixing scheme. Ben's revenge plot goes awry.
episodes.title: Sitting on Top of the World

episodes.synopsis: Stevie begins his job with Ben as Ike deals with the fallout of his hotel deal and the grim realities of the gambling bill. Sy arrives in Miami.
episodes.title: ...And Your Enemies Closer

episodes.synopsis: As passage of the gambling bill nears, Klein considers Ike's offer to get Ben. Lily and Stevie end their affair, while Vera suffers a broken heart.
episodes.title: The Sins of the Father
